1_0.quote: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.
1_0.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

1_1.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
1_1.author: Albert Einstein

1_2.quote: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt.
1_2.author: Charles M. Schulz

2_0.quote: The ability to observe without evaluating is the highest form of intelligence.
2_0.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

2_1.quote: Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do.
2_1.author: Benjamin Spock

2_2.quote: Happiness is not the absence of problems, it's the ability to deal with them.
2_2.author: Steve Maraboli

2_3.quote: If I get married, I want to be very married.
2_3.author: Audrey Hepburn

2_4.quote: A great marriage is not when the ‘perfect couple’ comes together. It is when an imperfect couple learns to enjoy their differences.
2_4.author: Dave Meurer

2_5.quote: It is truth that liberates, not your effort to be free.
2_5.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

2_6.quote: Passion is a rather frightening thing because if you have passion you don't know where it will take you.
2_6.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

2_7.quote: The right one will love you, even after knowing all the flaws. The wrong one will blame you, even if you give your best.
2_7.author: Unknown

2_8.quote: When it hurts observe, life is trying to teach you something.
2_8.author: Siddhartha Gautama

3_0.quote: Be a good person, but don't waste time to prove it.
3_0.author: Unknown

3_1.quote: If you lose someone, but find yourself you won.
3_1.author: Unknown

3_2.quote: Some journeys take you farther from where you come from, but closer to where you belong.
3_2.author: Ron Franscell

3_3.quote: Happiness is your nature. It is not wrong to desire it. What is wrong is seeking it outside when it is inside.
3_3.author: Sri Ramana Maharshi

3_4.quote: The tongue like a sharp knife, kills without drawing blood.
3_4.author: Siddhartha Gautama

3_5.quote: Without communication there is no relationship. Without respect there is no love. Without trust, there’s no reason to continue.
3_5.author: Siddhartha Gautama

3_6.quote: A real women is her man's personal porn star
3_6.author: Unknown

3_7.quote: Someday someone will break you so badly, after which you will become un-breakable
3_7.author: Joker

4_0.quote: Life is not about waiting for the storm to pass, but about learning how to dance in the rain.
4_0.author: Unknown

4_1.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge. For knowledge is limited, whereas imagination encircles the world.
4_1.author: Albert Einstein

4_2.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
4_2.author: Mahatma Gandhi

4_3.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
4_3.author: Walt Disney

4_4.quote: I have a dream that one day, this nation will rise up and live out the true meaning of its creed: 'We hold these truths to be self-evident, that all men are created equal.'
4_4.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

4_5.quote: Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love.
4_5.author: Mother Teresa

4_6.quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
4_6.author: Nelson Mandela

4_7.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
4_7.author: Oscar Wilde

4_8.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
4_8.author: Henry David Thoreau

4_9.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.
4_9.author: Steve Jobs

4_10.quote: You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them.
4_10.author: Maya Angelou

5_0.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
5_0.author: Mahatma Gandhi

5_1.quote: Change is the only constant in life.
5_1.author: Heraclitus

5_2.quote: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it and join the dance.
5_2.author: Alan Watts

5_3.quote: The measure of intelligence is the ability to change.
5_3.author: Albert Einstein

5_4.quote: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.
5_4.author: Leo Tolstoy

5_5.quote: I have a dream that one day, this nation will rise up and live out the true meaning of its creed: 'We hold these truths to be self-evident, that all men are created equal.'
5_5.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

5_6.quote: Until we get equality in education, we won’t have an equal society.
5_6.author: Sonia Sotomayor

5_7.quote: Equality is the soul of liberty; there is, in fact, no liberty without it.
5_7.author: Frances Wright

5_8.quote: Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere.
5_8.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

5_9.quote: All men are created equal, it is only men themselves who place themselves above equality.
5_9.author: David Allan Coe

5_10.quote: To deny people their human rights is to challenge their very humanity.
5_10.author: Nelson Mandela

5_11.quote: We are all equal in the fact that we are all different.
5_11.author: C. JoyBell C.

5_12.quote: No one is born hating another person because of the color of his skin, or his background, or his religion.
5_12.author: Nelson Mandela

5_13.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
5_13.author: Lao Tzu

5_14.quote: Well done is better than well said.
5_14.author: Benjamin Franklin

5_15.quote: An idea not coupled with action will never get any bigger than the brain cell it occupied.
5_15.author: Arnold H. Glasow

5_16.quote: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
5_16.author: Tony Robbins

5_17.quote: Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.
5_17.author: Peter Marshall

5_18.quote: Happiness can exist only in acceptance.
5_18.author: George Orwell

5_19.quote: Acceptance doesn’t mean resignation; it means understanding that something is what it is and there’s got to be a way through it.
5_19.author: Michael J. Fox

5_20.quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
5_20.author: Pablo Picasso

5_21.quote: The measure of intelligence is the ability to change.
5_21.author: Albert Einstein

5_22.quote: Life belongs to the living and he who lives must be prepared for changes.
5_22.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

5_23.quote: To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.
5_23.author: Winston Churchill

5_24.quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear—not absence of fear.
5_24.author: Mark Twain

5_25.quote: Our ability to reach unity in diversity will be the beauty and the test of our civilization.
5_25.author: Mahatma Gandhi

5_26.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
5_26.author: Walt Disney

5_27.quote: Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken-winged bird that cannot fly.
5_27.author: Langston Hughes

5_28.quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
5_28.author: Nelson Mandela

5_29.quote: Freedom is never voluntarily given by the oppressor; it must be demanded by the oppressed.
5_29.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

5_30.quote: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
5_30.author: Walter Winchell

5_31.quote: Growth is the only evidence of life.
5_31.author: John Henry Newman

5_32.quote: Without continual growth and progress, such words as improvement, achievement and success have no meaning.
5_32.author: Benjamin Franklin

5_33.quote: There may be times when we are powerless to prevent injustice, but there must never be a time when we fail to protest.
5_33.author: Elie Wiesel

5_34.quote: Our human compassion binds us to one another – not in pity or patronizingly, but as human beings who have learned how to turn our common suffering into hope for the future.
5_34.author: Nelson Mandela

5_35.quote: You must not lose faith in humanity. Humanity is an ocean; if a few drops of the ocean are dirty, the ocean does not become dirty.
5_35.author: Mahatma Gandhi

5_36.quote: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
5_36.author: Charlie Chaplin

5_37.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge. For knowledge is limited, whereas imagination encircles the world.
5_37.author: Albert Einstein

5_38.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
5_38.author: Oscar Wilde

5_39.quote: Integrity is doing the right thing, even when no one is watching.
5_39.author: C. S. Lewis

5_40.quote: A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
5_40.author: Lao Tzu

6_0.quote: The true test of a man’s character is what he does when no one is watching.
6_0.author: John Wooden

6_1.quote: Character is the ability to carry out a good resolution long after the excitement of the moment has passed.
6_1.author: Cavett Robert

6_2.quote: Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man’s character, give him power.
6_2.author: Abraham Lincoln

6_3.quote: People grow through experience if they meet life honestly and courageously. This is how character is built.
6_3.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

6_4.quote: Character is how you treat those who can do nothing for you.
6_4.author: Unknown

6_5.quote: Compassion is the basis of morality.
6_5.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

6_6.quote: Our task must be to free ourselves by widening our circle of compassion to embrace all living creatures and the whole of nature in its beauty.
6_6.author: Albert Einstein

6_7.quote: If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.
6_7.author: Dalai Lama

6_8.quote: Compassion is not a relationship between the healer and the wounded. It’s a relationship between equals.
6_8.author: Pema Chödrön

6_9.quote: Compassion brings us to a stop, and for a moment we rise above ourselves.
6_9.author: Mason Cooley

6_10.quote: With confidence, you have won before you have started.
6_10.author: Marcus Garvey

6_11.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
6_11.author: Theodore Roosevelt

7_1.quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
7_1.author: Benjamin Franklin
